title: Balance Zyra around mid
body:
The latest nerf on Zyra hit her way too hard, so hard that you can't take her to the midlane and expect to win now. You can't call her a lane bully anymore. 

Her plants auto targeting champions were the only form of reliable damage in her kit and now when that's gone it's sad to say that she's completely atrocious. Even in the support lane. 

She needs some changes and here are my suggestions.

Decrease the amount of seeds she can have placed on the map and buff her passive and W so that she can spawn seeds faster, this way she will be way more active in both the laning phase and game overall while her ability to zone will be toned down. 

Q: I can't express this enough, it needs to be changed back into its original shape. The rectangular Q is way too hard to hit and trying to make the plants target champions by hitting it is near impossible. Especially in higher ELO. Also decrease the cooldown on her Q on earlier levels. 

Last but not least, people have pointed this out a thooousand times DECREASE her base damage and INCREASE her AP ratios, this is the only way to hit support Zyra without harming mid Zyra.

replies.body:
I mean, they nerfed Annie's base Damages and Increased her AP ratios, for the same reasons Zyra was nerfed.

Why don't they do it everytime when a Mage goes Bot Lane as "Support"?  I really don't get it.

Because what works for one champion might not work on another. Zyra already has pretty comparably low bases compared to most mages, stopping at 200 for both her E and Q alone. 

Annie has 220 and 250 on Q and W respectively. Both unmissable if within range. Karma has 260 Q and W (W with both procs of W). Velkoz has 240 and 275 on Q and W respectively. In Zyra's case, turn that base lower, and it still hits her Mid lane, as how she's going to kill anyone without AP?

>Because what works for one champion might not work on another. Zyra already has pretty comparably low bases compared to most mages, stopping at 200 for both her E and Q alone.

That's bullshit.
 
Zyra's highest damage ability is her plants. They have a damage of 114+(0.15AP) per hit at level 18. This is upwards of 50% of Zyra's kit's damage at base, slightly less when building AP because the ratio is pathetic. Seriously, the ratio on plant is so bad that it takes 760 AP for Zyra to double the damage. That is unheard of for a mage, almost every other mage doubles the damage on their primary damage ability with between 300 and 500 AP. To put into perspective just how bad 760 AP to double is it takes Janna 560 AP to double the damage on her Zephyr, not even her primary damage ability.

In short you're looking at the wrong abilities. Zyra has astonishingly high bases, just on her primary damage ability.

So we tone the bases, and raise Ratios on what? Her plants? Now we've made Zyra completely reliant on her plants to kill people, which, harms her anywhere outside of laning phase. You've now made her a better early game, due to highly punishing plant autos that can't be dodged, and turning her spells into "Plant Targeters" instead of actual abilities. 

Personally, I don't consider Max DPS of her plant to be included as a Base. Karma or Velkoz's delayed procs, certainly, since it's just 1-2 pop. That's like saying Heimers Turrets Base damage is XXX simply because they can do a total amount of X damage over X seconds. You can destroy a Plant, get out of their range, or just dodge the auto targeting ability, and that Base disappears. 

We're talking base damages, not Optimal damages, which having a plant hit every single one of it's Autos, would fall under.

> Now we've made Zyra completely reliant on her plants to kill people

But she already is though... Your full combo without plants does deal about 1/2 of enemy's health if you're not disgustingly fed and one plant rarely secures the kill, you always need at least two. The only change they need to make is making the base plant damage like 90 on level 18 and make the scaling 2.5 - 3.5, would fix the whole problem.

>Personally, I don't consider Max DPS of her plant to be included as a Base. Karma or Velkoz's delayed procs, certainly, since it's just 1-2 pop. That's like saying Heimers Turrets Base damage is XXX simply because they can do a total amount of X damage over X seconds. You can destroy a Plant, get out of their range, or just dodge the auto targeting ability, and that Base disappears.

They're part of her bases, it's not even arguable. Zyra deals more damage with plants than spells bellow about 500 AP. It's a fact.

Looking at Zyra's spells only and saying "her bases are low" is like looking at Ashe and saying "she has 2 damaging spells, she clearly can't deal damage", you're ignoring that both of these champs have a large potential for damage over time.

>We're talking base damages, not Optimal damages, which having a plant hit every single one of it's Autos, would fall under.

It doesn't matter if you hit optimal plant damage or if you have 2 plants hit 1 attack each, the ratio is the same. Regardless of how many plants you have and how many attacks they land the ratios will always be the same, 760 AP at level 18 to double damage.

>So we tone the bases, and raise Ratios on what? Her plants? Now we've made Zyra completely reliant on her plants to kill people, which, harms her anywhere outside of laning phase. You've now made her a better early game, due to highly punishing plant autos that can't be dodged, and turning her spells into "Plant Targeters" instead of actual abilities.

That would be what the rework already did.

You seem to be making the assumption that all I'm thinking is "pull damage from her plant bases and pump it into the plant ratios till she's a mid laner", while that approach certainly has the potential to achieve the stated goal I don't think it would be the best way of going about it. I'd like to see quite a bit of power pulled from plants bases and put back into both her plants ratios and her Q in general. I'd actually like to see her Q have a higher base and a higher ratio than it does currently, as it stands Q only exists to spawn and aggro plants, I'd like to see it be a spell that you actively want to dodge because it's a threat.

The changes I'd personally make to Zyra (short of a full scale rework at least) are

* Plant Damage: 24+5/level(+15%AP)>24+2.5/level(+25%AP)
* Q Damage: 25+35/rank(+60%AP)>20+45/rank(+70%AP)
* Q hitbox reverted
* R damage: 95+85/rank(+70%AP)>50+100/rank(+80%AP)

What do these changes do? Universally they reward more AP while the Q and R changes reward hitting levels earlier, which mid Zyra does. They make Q a more optimal rank over E and punish Zyra's who don't build AP with lower early-mid damage Rs and lower damage plants.

> [{quoted}](name=LankPants,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gdEs0LAO,comment-id=00030000000000000001,timestamp=2017-03-02T05:30:35.913+0000)
>
> They're part of her bases, it's not even arguable. Zyra deals more damage with plants than spells bellow about 500 AP. It's a fact.
> 
> Looking at Zyra's spells only and saying "her bases are low" is like looking at Ashe and saying "she has 2 damaging spells, she clearly can't deal damage", you're ignoring that both of these champs have a large potential for damage over time.
> 
> It doesn't matter if you hit optimal plant damage or if you have 2 plants hit 1 attack each, the ratio is the same. Regardless of how many plants you have and how many attacks they land the ratios will always be the same, 760 AP at level 18 to double damage.
> 
> That would be what the rework already did.
> 
> You seem to be making the assumption that all I'm thinking is "pull damage from her plant bases and pump it into the plant ratios till she's a mid laner", while that approach certainly has the potential to achieve the stated goal I don't think it would be the best way of going about it. I'd like to see quite a bit of power pulled from plants bases and put back into both her plants ratios and her Q in general. I'd actually like to see her Q have a higher base and a higher ratio than it does currently, as it stands Q only exists to spawn and aggro plants, I'd like to see it be a spell that you actively want to dodge because it's a threat.
> 
> The changes I'd personally make to Zyra (short of a full scale rework at least) are
> 
> * Plant Damage: 24+5/level(+15%AP)>24+2.5/level(+25%AP)
> * Q Damage: 25+35/rank(+60%AP)>20+45/rank(+70%AP)
> * Q hitbox reverted
> * R damage: 95+85/rank(+70%AP)>50+100/rank(+80%AP)
> 
> What do these changes do? Universally they reward more AP while the Q and R changes reward hitting levels earlier, which mid Zyra does. They make Q a more optimal rank over E and punish Zyra's who don't build AP with lower early-mid damage Rs and lower damage plants.

I always max q over e anyways. she has way more damage on her plants and they are longer range. i mean i get that maxing e makes the root longer, but if you root someone you can blow them up with you wwqr combo. They wont be able to get away unless they flash.
You get the same damage from E>Q currently. On supports Zyra there's really no reason to rank Q over E.
I like this. I can deal with the Q staying the same since I got used to it already but the number changes are perfect.
Zyra has her W to provide plant damage outside lane, and she still spawns plenty of seeds when gathering around objectives.
Yes take her back, also don't forget {{champion:63}}, {{champion:90}} and {{champion:161}}.
We don't want her either.
Speak for yourself, I'd rather play against Zyra mid than fox slut any day of the week.
You say that, but I'll be the one laughing when you want to kill yourself playing against Zyra against unavoidable plant damage if they ever revert the nerf.
~~(Most of very high Elo Zyra mains consider Ahri the biggest mid Zyra counter)~~
I never mentioned Ahri or said I couldn't deal with her. Her plant changes was one of the best nerfs as it wasn't free, unavoidable, harass which I found incredibly annoying to play against.
Yeah, guess why lane bullies are called lane bullies... (still way less obnoxious than half the roaster)

I mean, she didn't even have to hit her plants, just the general area to spawn them on top of auto targeting champs in the area. Pretty sure that was nerfed so she has to actually hit them recently, though.

You mean hit her spells, not plants, I assume, right? xD Yes, that worked until 350 units range - for the first hit, then everyone would go away and plant wold switch agro, so you can just kill it if not getting hit by Zyra's AA or another spell. I get people got pissed off if she is played with TLD, which she is everytime when support (but Lux sure is a different case, she does the same thing with E + AA, but that's ok), but Zyra loses ridiculous amount of late game power if not taking DFT. It's a tradeoff. And many champions will do the same thing, I actually have no idea why Zyra is so hated when many champions do the same thing... Guess it's caused by that the damage is dealt by anything else than Zyra and it makes an ilsion of 1v2, but from this perspective Zyra herself does no damage, only her plants, so... Idk.

Edit: I just realized - late game in 2017, lul xD

> I actually have no idea why Zyra is so hated when many champions do the same thing...

It's because she's a better Heimerdinger. Her plants are stronger and don't die to AoE instantly. Her plants auto target for significant damage, unlike Donger turrets where you can easily avoid the majority of their damage. You can't dive a Zyra when she has seeds because of her R and plants, just like you can't dive a Donger nest. She offers a much better teamfight both damage wise and utility wise. The only thing Heimer does better is instadeleting a squishy with RW. You just have to kill her when she doesn't have seeds, which means in laning phase to kill her as soon as she gets back to lane before she can get seeds as you can't effectively deny her creating her plants.  If you go to kill one, there's a good chance you'll eat Q damage and if you're too slow you'll eat plant damage.

Comparing her to Lux, Lux can easily apply E AA but at least her E is one of the highest costing spells in the game. You can safely dive a Lux if she has used her Q, but even without Zyra's E she has the threat of QR into thorny death. Zyra is the epitome of having to kill her before she can do anything.

Yes, I understand Ahri's kit is good against her, (W one shots plants if they all target the plant iirc.) and an E means death, but its having the ability to actually get to E her is the issue.

Get your point, you just miss one thing that has never been actually spoken: Her seeds are a minigame you have to play around, same as, let's say, Ekko's R damage - you have to play around it. Position yourself to engage on her from the angle she has no seeds in. A good Zyra will watch you and position herself to be always covered. There are many things you can do with it. 

**a)** You can pretend to engage where she has the most seeds and immidately back off - you can make her use her Q and thus let her waste all the seeds in the area, which many - if not most - will do, because they're hungry for an easy kill of an opponent that walks in her garden by themself. When the plants die, you can engage. 

**b)** You can walk around the seeds to make her move so she tries to position seeds between herself and you and bait her right in the trap of your jungler, that can immidiately CC her so you can follow up with your CC, or a stealthed jungler - that's why Evelynn is a great counterpick. 

**c)** If she has suspiciously few seeds in the lane, NEVER follow her in the bush, because seeds are set to spawn there primarilly and she's going to try to stay close to the bush where she has seeds stacked up in. If your jungler ganks, it's actually a good idea to gank FROM that bush, since that cuts her from the seeds and leaves her helpless - only pay attention if the bush is warded, then they would come to a sure death.

Those are just few examples what to do, but it's situational most of the time, as it depends on the seeds spawned RNG and the Zyra player's playstyle as an individual, but if I should generalize it, just play around the seeds, the rest of her kit is rather easy to dodge and anticipate. Also roam, if you manage to catch her when she follows, she has nothing to do, because she has no seeds nearby and is so squishy you can burst her before she manages to cast Grasping roots.

And I said I won't tell anyone as I would be against myself below, lul...
As an Ahri main, it's surprising to see you feel this way. Ahri has probably one of the best kits to deal with all immobile mages, especially Zyra with her slow, telegraphed abilities.
>I never mentioned Ahri or said I couldn't deal with her. Her plant changes was one of the best nerfs as it wasn't free, unavoidable, harass which I found incredibly annoying to play against.
Would be nice if we could have {{champion:43}} back, too.
I don't mind, I also never used her.

She used to be a solid and versatile utility mid, and a strong duelist. Now she's a  super niche mid you can only really pick if you have carries top and jungle, with a mage like Brand or Zyra in bot lane.
"so hard that you can't take her to the midlane and expect to win now" You shouldn't play any champion and expect to win. You should play a champion, and try to win.
They are saying that taking her mid is pointless now since she is so weak in damage

I really don't get the outcry of the nerf, now you have to land your abilities to be rewarded with your stuff, its a major change now that you cant just level 1-2 fuck someone because you got a lucky plant spawn or choose to zone for fucking eternity just because you're at level 2 (hello {{champion:7}} )

The outcry is basically because mid Zyra was already unviable trash and any nerf to Zyra mid was completely unwarranted. This is after Riot stated they'd balance around both mid and bot in the MYMU thread. So far there's been no balancing around mid at all.
except that mid mage zyra would be taken as a bot support and proceed to 1v2 the enemy bot lane, while the adc eats glue...
Yep I can confirm we all eat glue its essential to playing adc

Sigh, I enjoyed her mid too when my champs were banned or I was against someone I could destroy. 

Her early poke with plants was her only way to get a kill... She can't 100-0 anyone during laning and her spells are super telegraphed so it's not hard to dodge both her damage and snare.

And about the base/scaling stuff, I think that it's a good idea (something similar already worked with Lulu), but I don't really see a problem with Zyra sup right now. Her win rate dropped by like 2/3% after last patch so I doubt she's worth another nerf to her support role.

> 
> but I don't really see a problem with Zyra sup right now. Her win rate dropped by like 2/3% after last patch so I doubt she's worth another nerf to her support role.

The win rate is not the problem with her: she's fucking aggravating to play against.

Between playing whack-a-mole with her plants or try to dodge as many of her spells as possible, you also have to worry about the adc and maybe the jungler.

You have probably never played against a good Blitzcrank then.

You know, if she misses her spells, she is totally worthless now. Also, she's one of the squishiest champs in the whole game and so she's easily punishable if you're smart enough.

I understand that maybe she's not a pleasure to play against like, idk, Nami, but she's far from being OP right now.

> [{quoted}](name=zImaginaerum,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gdEs0LAO,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-02T14:07:07.908+0000)
>
> You have probably never played against a good Blitzcrank then.
>

Oh yes I did and trust me, I would prefer fighting Blitzcrank over any ap mages at bot lane.
 
> You know, if she misses her spells, she is totally worthless now. Also, she's one of the squishiest champs in the whole game and so she's easily punishable if you're smart enough.
> 
First of all, her missing her q is not important, her e is since it's her only form of cc (which is way most zyra max it first)

It also depends on matchup, if you are someone like thresh or blitzcrank maybe, but if you are a tank support or a squishy support, good luck.

Also you forgot the adc, especially in a meta where lethality adcs are here who bring cc on the table (and also Cait)

> I understand that maybe she's not a pleasure to play against like, idk, Nami, but she's far from being OP right now.

She's not op of course but for me, something is wrong when a professional team has to use the combination of 2 **marksman**, I repeat, 2 **marksman** when 1 was never designed to be a support to beat her in lane.

They tried balancing her around mid
She was way too strong support
Now they balance her around support
Please no, i just fought a zyra mid and zyra gives me cancer.

> [{quoted}](name=Skorch,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gdEs0LAO,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2017-03-02T03:31:41.551+0000)
>
> Please no, i just fought a zyra mid and zyra gives me cancer.

was it me. I main zyra mid and support
That depends, have you fought an ori recently, on a team that had no smite? ;-;

Ori should win that lane, just fyi. Zyra can't ult you without putting herself in position to be shockwaved out of her combo. And Zyra can basically never AA Ori without taking a huge loss on the trade.

That said, Zyra should win mid/late due to her safe poke damage and easier picks.
First game as Ori since i bought her, and i had played her twice before one in urf :         ^)

Hey Everyone! So I will be posting this in other topics as well just to get some feedback as the position Zyra is in right now. Hoping that we can make Zyra more reliable :)

Passive: No change.
"But make seeds spawn in close proximity OR have spells be able to reach the same distance as the seeds.

Q: Increase damage OR ap ratio.
"NEW" The size of the spell grows twice at levels 8/16. As a controller this definitely helps with reaching far away seeds, dealing big aoe damage and wave clear too!

W: Holds 3 charges now. (If I'm being chased and my passive is spawning seeds away from me, I NEED to have plants available as quick as possible. It's disappointing that she relies too much on plants but in this case, they need to be readily available). 

E: Slightly longer reach for where the vines travel to. No longer summons lashers now as spitters are more reliable.

R: Ultimate will now slow enemies within by 40% or 60%.

#ZyraMain
they can't balance her around midlane because the second they do she's an even more god tier support

making zyra auto attack or land abilities was a pretty welcome change in my opinion, now she has to land abilities to harass/trade which is how it should be. no one liked getting poked by someone who used an ability near them, it's not very interactive for the other person
Just leave it's range, come back and kill the plant tho... ._.
But my CS!

I get it's a joke, but if anyone takes this seriously: {{champion:268}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:68}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:420}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:51}}
I don't see how these champions compare to Zyra.
Go for that CS when you play against them :3
